name: Rose Queen
cardText:
[fanfare] Select any number of Pixie followers in your EX area and transform them into Thorn Burst tokens.
[act][engage]: Recover X play points. X equals the number of Thorn Burst tokens in your EX area.

name: Ancient Elf
cardText:
[evolve][cost01]: Evolve this follower.
Ward.
[fanfare] Return another card on your field to its owner's hand: Give this follower [attack]+1/[defense]+1.

name: Ancient Elf (Evolved)
cardText:
Ward.
On Evolve, return another card on your field to its owner's hand: Give this follower [attack]+1/[defense]+1.

name: Rhinoceroach
cardText:
[evolve][cost00]: Evolve this follower.
Rush.
[fanfare] Give this follower [attack]+X. X equals the number of cards you've played this turn, excluding this card.

name: Rhinoceroach (Evolved)
cardText: On Evolve: Choose one of the following effects. (1) Give this follower Storm. (2) Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it X damage. X equals this follower's attack.

name: Robin Hood
cardText:
[fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.
[act][cost01], [engage]: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

name: Silver Bolt
cardText:
[quick]
Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Draw a card and then deal X damage to the selected enemy. X equals the number of cards in your hand.

name: Homecoming
cardText: Select an enemy follower on the field. Its controller puts it on the top or bottom of its owner's deck. Combo (5): Each opponent puts each follower from their field on the top or bottom of its owner's deck instead. (The controllers determine the placement. Tokens put into a player's deck are removed from the game.)

name: Elven Princess Mage
cardText: [evolve][cost01]: Evolve this follower.

name: Elven Princess Mage (Evolved)
cardText: On Evolve: Put 2 Fairy Wisp tokens into your EX area.

name: Blessed Fairy Dancer
cardText: [fanfare] Give [attack]+1/[defense]+1 to each other Pixie follower on your field and in your EX area.

name: Elf Child May
cardText:
[fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.
When this card is returned to hand from your field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

name: Fairy Beast
cardText: [act] Banish a Pixie follower in your EX area: Give your leader [defense]+3 and draw a card. This ability can be activated once per turn.

name: Noble Fairy
cardText:
Ward.
[fanfare] Combo (3): Select an enemy follower on the field. Destroy it and summon a Fairy token on that follower's field.

name: Nature's Guidance
cardText: Select a card on your field. Return it to its owner's hand and draw a card.

name: Harvest Festival
cardText:
[act][cost01], [engage], put this card into its owner's cemetery: Give your leader [defense]+1.
When this card leaves the field, draw a card.

name: Archer
cardText:
[evolve][cost01]: Evolve this follower.
Whenever another follower is put onto your field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

name: Archer (Evolved)
cardText: Whenever another follower is put onto your field, select up to 2 enemy followers on the field and deal them 1 damage.

name: Fairy Whisperer
cardText: [fanfare] Summon a Fairy token. Put a Fairy token into your EX area.

name: Mana Elk
cardText: Whenever one of your Pixie followers attacks, select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

name: Woodland Curse
cardText:
[quick]
Select an enemy follower on the field. It cannot deal damage this turn.

name: Thorn Burst
cardText: Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Deal it 3 damage and draw a card.
